task.title: Configure cluster name on SolidFire eSDS node
task.shortdesc: You must configure the cluster name on each SolidFire eSDS node before you can add the node to a cluster. You can do this using either the per-node UI or the Element API.

context.note: You cannot change the cluster name after the cluster is created.

step.cmd: Choose from one of the following options:

choices.choice:
Use the per-node UI:
Open the per-node management node UI: https://<node_mip>:442.
Click Cluster Settings and enter the cluster name.
Click Apply Changes.
